Context: Changes to LLC Laptop Loan Policy made on December 18, 2023. The policy applies to current students, faculty, and staff for educational purposes. Usage of electronic products is monitored, and violations may result in disciplinary action. Guidelines for most resources can be found in their respective catalog records. Access George Brown Libraries' contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The website information is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation or warranty. Colin Fitzsimmons is the Director of Academic Services & Learning Resources as of March 1, 2023. For college news, deadlines, events, tours, sign up at "Sign Up Now". Land acknowledgment information is also available.
